QuestData.Title: The Withered
QuestData.Description: The withered are the worst kind of pest. They capture our whelplings, knock them unconscious, and then drink whatever mana they can from the helpless babes.$b$bNormally our drakes and keepers would fend them off. Today, it looks like we may need your help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa withered in the Azurewing Whelplands.
QuestData.RewardText: Twelve withered slain? Very good.$b$bThat should be enough to keep them away for a few months.
